organizations: Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Jim Carrey
title: Carrey’s ex ‘took Scientology classes’
text:
Jim Carrey’s late ex-girlfriend ‘was a Scientologist who took intensive survival courses’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Jim Carrey’s late ex-girlfriend ‘was a Scientologist who took intensive survival courses’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Jim Carrey's Girlfriend Commits Suicide 0:53 
According to TMZ, Jim Carrey's on-again/off-again girlfriend, Cathriona White, committed suicide. September 30th 2015 2 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ 
JIM Carrey’s late ex-girlfriend, Cathriona White, was reportedly a Scientologist who was taking classes at the church’s Hollywood Celebrity Centre at the time of her death. 
Journalist Tony Ortega , who has written about the cult for 20 years, claimed the 30-year-old got involved in Scientology four or five years ago and had recently been working on her “objectives” in the “Survival Rundown.” 
A suicide note found by her body mentioned Carrey, but no further details have been revealed. 
The Truman Show star described White’s death as being like a “lightning bolt.” Couple ... Cathriona White and Jim Carrey, 53, dated briefly after meeting in 2012, but rekindled their relationship in May. Picture: Splash News 
According to Ortega, White was introduced to Scientology by members of singer and Scientologist Beck’s circle of friends. Other Stories
